We're looking to fill two positions here at the Internet Archive.  The
openings are in our webgroup, the team that works on Heritrix.

http://www.archive.org/about/UIEngineer.htm
http://www.archive.org/about/testengineer-gmrev.htm

If anyone is interested, please write prg@....

We're actually having trouble finding candidates so if anyone has
suggestions for where else we should post, please let us know.

Thanks,
St.Ack
